Package com.g1.mychess.auth.service

Interface AuthService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AuthServiceImpl
public interface AuthService
Service interface for handling authentication and authorization operations, including user registration, login, email verification, and password management.

  • Method Details

    • registerUser

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> registerUser(RegisterRequestDTO registerRequestDTO)
      Registers a new user with the provided registration details.
      Parameters:
      registerRequestDTO - the DTO containing user registration details
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a success message or error details

    • login

      String login(String username, String password, String role)
      Authenticates a user and provides a token for successful login.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      password - the password of the user
      role - the role of the user (e.g., "USER" or "ADMIN")
      Returns:
      a token for accessing authenticated endpoints, or error message if login fails

    • resendVerificationEmail

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> resendVerificationEmail(String email)
      Resends the email verification link to the specified email address.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address to which the verification email should be sent
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a message indicating success or failure of email sending

    • requestPasswordReset

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> requestPasswordReset(String email)
      Initiates a password reset request by sending a reset link to the user's email.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address of the user requesting a password reset
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a message indicating the result of the reset request

    • resetPassword

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> resetPassword(String resetToken, String newPassword)
      Resets the user's password using a valid reset token.
      Parameters:
      resetToken - the token for verifying the password reset request
      newPassword - the new password to set for the user
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a message indicating the success or failure of the password reset

    • verifyEmail

      void verifyEmail(String token)
      Verifies a user's email using the provided token.
      Parameters:
      token - the token sent to the user's email for verification

    • isEmailVerified

      boolean isEmailVerified(Long userId, String userType)
      Checks if a user's email is verified.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      userType - the type of user (e.g., "PLAYER" or "ADMIN")
      Returns:
      true if the user's email is verified; false otherwise
